augmenttype.name: Super Speed
augmenttype.description: Replacing the legs of a Liberal with mechanical ones would increase their speed and reaction extensively.

augmenttype.name: Super Squats
augmenttype.description: Iron is a vital chemical for humans, so by infusing the legs of this Liberal with steel, they will be more ready than ever to take on any Conservative challenge that they will run into.

augmenttype.name: Toned Calves
augmenttype.description: Our scientists have found the ultimate chemical formula that gives a Liberal the ultimate tanned calves. Behold, may all who lay eyes upon them be trapped by their beauty.

augmenttype.name: Mighty Strength
augmenttype.description: We can artificially stimulate the muscles in a Liberals arms, and make them stronger and more powerful than ever before.

augmenttype.name: Sleeve Tattoos
augmenttype.description: By covering the arms of a Liberal with these tattoos, which are laced with a special compound, they will be even more ready to devote their lives to the liberal cause.

augmenttype.name: Increased Awareness
augmenttype.description: By augmenting a Liberal's language centers, we can give them increased language processing and awareness when dealing with other people.

augmenttype.name: Faster Neural Feedback
augmenttype.description: By supplying the brain cells with a constant source of methamphetamines, electrical signals increase in speed drastically.

augmenttype.name: Brain Juice
augmenttype.description: Our Liberal Scientists have developed a pill that, when taken twice a day (once in the morning and once in the evening with warm glass of Liberal Milk), increases brain power ten-fold.

augmenttype.name: Hardened Skin
augmenttype.description: Human skin has far outlived its usefulness in an evolutionary aspect, not able to stop even the smallest of bullets. Therefore, we should remove the skin of a Liberal, and encase them in a metal shell!

augmenttype.name: Thick Skin
augmenttype.description: By enhancing this Liberal's skin, they will be better prepared to fight off the words of the Conservative Swine, and less likely to be brainwashed to their side.

augmenttype.name: Gorilla Heart
augmenttype.description: Numorous Liberal Reports have shown that by transplanting a gorilla heart into the body of an augmentee, their Liberal Devotion increases tenfold!

augmenttype.name: Rock Hard Abs
augmenttype.description: These abs are the result of centuries of Liberal science, perfected to the epitomy of all abs. They increase your core strength one hundred fold.
